title: How to stream Apple’s iPhone 6s and TV event on Android, iOS, Windows, and Mac
text: Hey Siri, can you show me the new Apple products yet? Apple’s big “Hey Siri” event kicks off at 10 a.m. PT (1 p.m. ET) in San Francisco. But don’t worry, you can stream the presentation live here via Safari on just about any iDevice. And, for the first time in a long time, Apple’s official stream will […] »
